title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to seek revenge against those who destroyed his family.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Spider‑Man: No Way Home
description: Spider‑Man seeks help from Doctor Strange after his identity is revealed, causing multiverse chaos.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and his family face new threats on Pandora while exploring the ocean clans.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
